CustomField.description: Amount of revenue that is ready for recognition within the relevant time period for the Timecard revenue source, when using the Deliverable recognition method. Populated by the revenue forecast version batch Apex job.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Amount of revenue that is ready for recognition within the relevant time period for the Timecard revenue source, when using the Deliverable recognition method. Populated by the revenue forecast version batch Apex job.
CustomField.label: Deliverable: Timecard: Pending
